snippet: Ford is again recalling about 340,000 Windstar minivans from 1998 to 2003 because an earlier effort to fix a rear axle that could break might not have been done properly.
abstract: Ford announces recall of around 340,000 Windstar minivans from 1998 to 2003; vehicles are being recalled because 2010 recall of 500,000 Windstars may not have fixed rear axle defect.
lead_paragraph: Ford is again recalling about 340,000 Windstar minivans from 1998 to 2003 because an earlier effort to fix a rear axle that could break might not have been done properly.

headline.print_headline: Ford Windstar Minivans Recalled for a Second Time
headline.main: Ford Windstar Minivans Recalled for a Second Time
